issue.title: youtube.com

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > I have paid for adguard, advance protection to block advanced YouTube ads, and I am still receiving ads on the YouTube iOS app. I have enabled everything in the Safari settings, and in the AdGuard app I have updated the rules. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/jUGyZPW.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard/AdGuard Pro for iOS v4.4.4 Browser: | YouTube iOS DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Other Annoyances Other extensions used: | Firefox focus
